title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.82 - Transportation differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.82 - Transportation differentials

State Regulations

The transportation differential shall be plus or minus
the appropriate differential shown in column B of the schedule in section
20.52
(c) of this

Part for the zone of the plant to which the milk is delivered or, in the case
of farms included in units, the zone of the township in which the milk is
received. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
20.82

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
